collections.heading: Monthly Call - November
collections.body: The view of the earth from the moon fascinated me - a small disk, 240,000 miles away.

collections.heading: Backlogs and why every website needs one
collections.body: I'm convinced that some wayward stranger in a space-craft, coming from some other part of the heavens, could look at earth and never know that it was inhabited at all.

collections.heading: Cultivating a dynamic career in UX
collections.body: We are one hunk of ground, water, air, clouds, floating around in space. From out there it really is 'one world'.
